languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте еще раз поблагодарить за оказанную честь. Пусть мы давно покинули флагман, приятно вновь предстать перед Лорд-капитаном". {n}Женщина с глазами темнее ночного неба смотрит на вас задумчивым, немигающим взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте еще раз поблагодарить за удостоенную честь. Пусть мы давно покинули флагман и не были лично знакомы до сего дня, приятно вновь предстать перед Лорд-капитаном". {n}Женщина с глазами темнее звездного неба смотрит на вас задумчивым немигающим взглядом.{/n}

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте еще раз поблагодарить за оказанную честь. Пусть мы давно покинули флагман, приятно вновь предстать перед Лорд-капитаном". {n}Женщина с глазами темнее ночного неба смотрит на вас задумчивым, немигающим взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}A woman with eyes darker than the night sky is looking at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}A woman with eyes darker than the night sky is looking at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, permettez-nous de vous exprimer une fois de plus toute notre gratitude pour cet honneur. Bien que nous ayons quitté le vaisseau il y a bien longtemps, c'est un plaisir d'être de nouveau en présence d'{mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}L'air pensif, Xioni vous regarde de ses yeux plus sombres que le ciel nocturne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, permettez-nous de vous exprimer une fois de plus toute notre gratitude pour cet honneur. Bien que nous ayons quitté le vaisseau il y a bien longtemps, c'est un plaisir d'être de nouveau en présence d'{mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}L'air pensif, Xioni vous regarde de ses yeux plus sombres que le ciel nocturne.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítanos darle las gracias por este honor otra vez. Aunque dejamos la nave insignia hace mucho, es un placer volver a estar en presencia de un{mf||a} Lord Capitán». {n}Xioni te dirige sin parpadear una mirada pensativa con ojos más negros que el cielo nocturno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítanos darle las gracias por este honor otra vez. Aunque dejamos la nave insignia hace mucho, es un placer volver a estar en presencia de un{mf||a} Lord Capitán». {n}Xioni te dirige sin parpadear una mirada pensativa con ojos más negros que el cielo nocturno.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、これほど名誉なこと、改めてお礼を申し上げます。旗艦を離れたのは、ずいぶん前のことですが、再びロード・キャプテンにお会いできて光栄です」{n}シオニは哀愁を含む表情でまばたきひとつせず、夜空よりも暗い眼差しでこちらを見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、これほど名誉なこと、改めてお礼を申し上げます。旗艦を離れたのは、ずいぶん前のことですが、再びロード・キャプテンにお会いできて光栄です」{n}シオニは哀愁を含む表情でまばたきひとつせず、夜空よりも暗い眼差しでこちらを見つめている。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，请允许我们再次感谢您赐予我们的荣誉。虽然我们很久以前就离开了旗舰，但我们很高兴能再次见到一位领主舰长。”{n}肖妮凝视着你，目光深沉，一眨不眨。她的眼睛比夜空还要黑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请允许我们再次感谢您赐予我们的荣誉。虽然我们很久以前就离开了旗舰，但我们很高兴能再次见到一位领主舰长。”{n}肖妮凝视着你，目光深沉，一眨不眨。她的眼睛比夜空还要黑。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, erlaubt uns, Euch ein weiteres Mal für diese Ehre zu danken. Wir haben das Flaggschiff zwar vor langer Zeit verlassen, aber es ist ein Vergnügen, wieder in Gesellschaft eines Lord Captain zu sein." {n}Xioni blickt dich nachdenklich und konzentriert an, ihre Augen sind dunkler als der Nachthimmel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, erlaubt uns, Euch ein weiteres Mal für diese Ehre zu danken. Wir haben das Flaggschiff zwar vor langer Zeit verlassen, aber es ist ein Vergnügen, wieder in Gesellschaft eines Lord Captain zu sein." {n}Xioni blickt dich nachdenklich und konzentriert an, ihre Augen sind dunkler als der Nachthimmel.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaadenizle bu onur için size tekrar teşekkürlerimizi sunmak istiyoruz. Sancak gemisinden uzun zaman önce ayrılmış olsak da bir kez daha Lord Kaptan'ın huzurunda olmak büyük bir keyif." {n}Xioni sana gözünü kırpmadan endişeli bir bakış atıyor. Gözleri, gece göğünden bile kara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, allow us to thank you once again for this honour. Though we left the flagship a long time ago, it is a pleasure to be in the presence of a Lord Captain again." {n}Xioni looks at you with a pensive, unblinking gaze, her eyes darker than the night sky.{/n}
